enabled.title: Determines if this transformer should show up if you run the 'Optimus' command from the quick pick menu. Defaults to true.

name.title: The name to be displayed in the quick pick menu.

sample.title: The input sample file, can be json, xml or csv

transformer.title: The file containing the transformation function, can be javascript or typescript

function.title: The function doing the transformation, must be of type 'any' or a typescript interface that complies to the file format in 'sample'
